name: DeConstructor (itch)
description:
DeConstructor is a game where you build houses, and tear them down with storms, tornadoes and tsunamis!
Expected to work on most machines, firefox might be a bit wonky with the mouse controls.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • 'I' To open the menu
  • When a part has been selected, press left click to put it down
  • If a part is still selected, press either right click, or open the menu, to de-select the part
  • To remove something, point at it, and press the middle mouse button
  • To load someone else's build, paste the text data onto the Text Box, and press "Load"
  • To save, click the save button, then press on the text box and copy everything , you can now save and share your builds with anyone!

Example builds:

Big house: https://pastebin.com/TAjapkTn

Small House: https://pastebin.com/jT4H9Ki6

Tips
Beams are placed in two steps, the first left click puts down the first point, then the second click stretches the beam to the desired shape.
